title: Canes leap to 2; OU to 7th; IU, Texas Tech surge
content: Miami jumped LSU and Penn State into the No. 2 spot behind Ohio State in the AP Top 25, while Oklahoma climbed into top 10 for the first time in two years.

title: Rodgers passes Favre on all-time pass TD list
content: Steelers quarterback Aaron Rodgers surpassed Brett Favre in career passing touchdowns Sunday with a 12-yard score to wide receiver DK Metcalf over Patriots cornerback Carlton Davis III.

title: Quinn out as coach of Storm after playoff loss
content: Noelle Quinn, the only Black female coach in the WNBA this season, will not return as head coach of the Storm, the team announced.

title: Sources: Cuse QB Angeli has torn Achilles tendon
content: Syracuse quarterback Steve Angeli suffered a torn Achilles tendon in Saturday's win over Clemson and will miss the rest of the season, sources told ESPN.

title: Brewers' Woodruff to IL, putting playoffs in doubt
content: The Brewers have placed pitcher Brandon Woodruff on the 15-day injured list with a right lat strain, putting his availability for the playoffs in jeopardy.

title: Parcells on Pats exit: Wish I did things differently
content: Bill Parcells said the Patriots franchise will always have a place in his heart before referencing his acrimonious departure in 1997, admitting he wished he "would have done things a little differently."

title: Hall of Famer Parent, Flyers great, dies at age 80

content: Clayton Kershaw, a three-time National League Cy Young Award winner and 11-time All-Star with the Dodgers, will retire after this season. "I'm at peace with it," he said. "I think it's the right time."

content: Alleging that the crowds that gather to see the TVK founder were there for his ‚Äòstar power‚Äô, he remarks that Vijay‚Äôs claim that he is putting the DMK government on the backfoot with his ‚Äòquestions‚Äô is absurd

title: Man held for pledging fake gold jewellery in Tirupattur
content: After tracking the suspect through CCTV footage and mobile phone tower signals, police apprehended him at his hideout in Hosur town.

content: Tribals from at least ten remote hamlets that come under Kovilur and Nammiyampattu village panchayats in the hills attended the day-long training at the centre.

title: Watch: ‚ÄúNo one in Bihar is protesting SIR, it‚Äôs just Delhi noise‚Äù ‚Äì Sanjay K Jha | The Hindu Mind
content: In this episode of The Hindu Mind, JDU Working President Sanjay K. Jha makes bold revelations on Bihar‚Äôs political future. He shares how Nitish Kumar offered the CM post to BJP in 2020, discusses the impact of double-engine government, and explains why the 2025 election is about Bihar‚Äôs next 25 years. Jha also speaks on Nishant Kumar‚Äôs political role, electoral roll revision, and how women voters transformed Bihar‚Äôs politics. With a deep dive into governance, caste arithmetic, and alliances, this is a must-watch conversation ahead of the 2025 Bihar Assembly polls.

title: Daughter ignites fresh feud in Lalu family ahead of Bihar election
content: According to the sources in the RJD, Rohini Acharya is unhappy over the expanding influence of Sanjay Yadav, the political advisor to Tejashwi Yadav, in the party; there is speculation that Rohini believes Sanjay is behind the party not entertaining her idea to contest in the upcoming election

title: 5,000 police deployed in Vijayawada for smooth conduct of Dasara festivities
content: The Endowments, Vijayawada Municipal Corporation, Police, Revenue, A.P. Transco, State Disaster Response Force, Medical and Health and other Departments to monitor the situation round-the-clock

title: A mixed bag of gloom, hope in Kerala‚Äôs IT sector over H-1B visa fee hike
content: The hike from $5,000 to $1,00,000 is bound to affect even large IT services companies. The scope for business expansion too will come down. However, experts feel that U.S. companies will set up more global capability centres in India, manned by their own people with expertise, which will benefit tier-2 cities

title: MP Engineer Rashid completed 30 hours of hunger strike in jail: Awami Ittehad Party
content: ‚ÄúProtest¬†is to call out hypocrisy of both India, Pak. governments which are busy celebrating cricket diplomacy, while ignoring the pain, sacrifices and human rights of people of Jammu and Kashmir,‚Äù says AIP

content: Cherring Dorjay Lakruk, the president of the powerful Ladakh Buddhist Association and co-convenor of the Leh Apex Body, says that ‚Äúoutsiders will take away all our businesses‚Äù

Statehood for J&K has not been restored despite the Centre‚Äôs promise to do that after holding Assembly elections, he says

content: In a bid to reach the U.S. via Mexico, Indian nationals have unlawfully entered Guatemala, EI Salvador, and Honduras; when they are arrested, the Embassy offers translation help and well-being support

content: The BJP MP said the Congress leader‚Äôs claims were baseless, and that Rahul Gandhi‚Äôs fight favours foreigners, not Indian voters

content: Authorities say pictures of the seer are prominently displayed in the offices of the Vice-Chancellor, Registrar and other important places in the institution

content: The aircraft was the backbone of the IAF till the mid-2000s, playing crucial roles in the 1965 and 1971 wars, the 1999 Kargil conflict, the 2019 Balakot air strikes, and most recently Operation Sindoor

content: When JD(U) slipped to third place in 2020 with just 43 seats, Mr. Jha recounts that Nitish had offered the CM‚Äôs chair to the BJP; in turn, BJP entrusted Mr. Kumar with the job as the poll was fought in his name

content: J&K leader says peace is prerequisite for tourism, sports and development; launches Real Kashmir FC‚Äôs ‚ÄòPeace Jersey‚Äô in Srinagar

content: Mr. Bera is a Democrat member of the House of Representatives, and an Indian American; his delegation has been invited to India to meet government officials and industry leaders in Delhi and Mumbai¬†¬†

content: Deputy CM inaugurates Telangana‚Äôs unique floral festival at the historic Thousand Pillar Temple in Hanamkonda; women offer prayers with vibrant floral offerings

title: Watch: GST rate cut kicks in from September 22, goods and services to become cheaper
content: About 99% of goods under the 12% GST slab currently will move to 5%. The rejig will also result in 90% items under 28% tax slab coming down to 18% bracket

title: Fishers‚Äô forum seeks action on CMLRE findings on shipwreck
content: The State govt. urged to examine the gravity of the findings and take legal and preventive measures based on the report

title: Andhra Pradesh bags ‚ÄòBest State Award‚Äô for silk development
content: The award, instituted under the ‚ÄòMera Resham - Mera Abhiman‚Äô programme of the Central Silk Board, is for effectively creating awareness among silk growers

title: Followers of Basaveshwara urged to mention Lingayat as their religion in survey
content: It is crucial to gaining religious minority status for Lingayats, according to Jagatika Lingayat Mahasabha

title: Guwahati unites in grief as fans pay last respects to Zubeen Garg
content: Fans line streets as singer‚Äôs mortal remains reach city; cremation to be held at Hatimura in Sonapur on September 23

title: Politics over Durga Puja picks up in West Bengal
content: While Mamata Banerjee referred to harassment of migrants during Durga Puja inauguration, Opposition leader Suvendu Adhikari accused the CM of inaugurating pujas before Mahalaya, a departure from Hindu tradition

title: Priyanka meets Jifri Thangal
content: The AICC general secretary‚Äôs visit is seen as politically significant as there are fissures within the Samastha over relations with the IUML, a major constituent of the Congress-led UDF.

title: Socio-educational survey in Karnataka is an attempt to divide Hinduism, says Ashok
content: Alleging that the socio-educational survey which is being held from Monday in Karnataka was an ‚Äòattempt to divide Hinduism‚Äô, Leader of the Opposition in the Assembly R. Ashok has urged Ministers opposing the survey to quit

title: ED conducts searches related to a Delhi-based group under FEMA
content: The searches were related to alleged undisclosed assets held outside India, worth about ‚Çπ80 crore, in Singapore, Dubai, the British Virgin Islands, and Thailand

title: Long wait for land conversion in city areas as applications pile up
content: Nearly 16,000 applications from Kanayannur taluk, which includes core urban areas of Kochi, remain pending

title: CMRF benefits more needy persons and amounts disbursed have gone up under current regime
content: As part of streamlining the CMRF disbursal, the officials have identified nearly 5,100 hospitals registered with the Director of Medical and Health

title: D.K. Shivakumar hits out at the BJP saying it is ‚Äòdividing people‚Äô
content: Deputy Chief Minister and Karnataka Pradesh Congress Committee president D.K. Shivakumar on Sunday dismissed the BJP‚Äôs charge that the Congress government was encouraging religious conversions in the name of the socio-educational survey, and asserted that the exercise was intended to ensure justice for socially and educationally backward communities.

content: On August 22, The Hindu¬†published the plight of coconut farmers and devastation along the Sankarguptam irrigation drain in Spotlight - When water scorches the earth¬†

title: Fan purchases OG movie ticket for record price of ‚Çπ1,29,999 in auction
content: The ticket was for the benefit show scheduled for 1 a.m. on September 25, the day of the film‚Äôs release, with tickets originally priced at ‚Çπ800

title: Pathanamthitta to host another Sabarimala meet as political stakes rise
content: Sangh Parivar-affiliated groups organise event in Pandalam the wake of a similar meeting at Pampa under the TDB aegis, which they term an ‚Äòattempt by the LDF govt. to thwart Ayyappa devotees.‚Äô In the 2020 local body elections, the BJP won Pandalam largely on the momentum gained from the 2018 Sabarimala protests

title: Funds mobilised by YSRCP govt. being spent on Polavaram, claims former Finance Minister Buggana Rajendranath Reddy¬†
content: The irrigation project made real progress during YSRCP term, he says, and terms the Chief Minister‚Äôs claim on bringing Krishna waters to Kuppam as false

title: Govt. medical college teachers in State to observe ‚Äòblack day‚Äô on September 22
content: They are demanding creation of new posts in the newly set up medical colleges as well as solution to wage-related issues

title: After uproar, backward classes commission decides to mask 33 Christian sub-castes from list for survey
content: After an uproar in political circles over the ‚Äúinclusion of new castes‚Äù in the Christian sub-caste category, the Karnataka State Commission for Backward Classes will mask 33 Christian sub-castes in the mobile application provided to enumerators for the socio-educational survey

title: Tamil Nadu among States that account for a majority share of discoms‚Äô regulatory assets
content: The regulatory assets position at the all-India level remains elevated at¬†‚Çπ3 lakh crore, mainly driven by Tamil Nadu, Uttar Pradesh, Rajasthan, Maharashtra, Delhi, West Bengal and Karnataka, says ICRA

title: T.N. govt. cannot put its political priority above the interests of students, Dharmendra Pradhan says of funds under Samagra Shiksha
content: The Union Minister insists that the Tamil Nadu government  accept the memorandum of understanding offered by the Centre for disbursal of Samagra Shiksha funds. The MoU mandates introduction of the three-language formula

title: Use power to empower others, AICC secretary urges youth
content: About 150 professionals from Palakkad, Chittur, Nenmara, Malampuzha and Kongad take part in leadership training camp for youth organised by All India Professional Congress

title: Eknath Shinde‚Äôs X account hacked; Congress raises alarm over cyber security
content: Hackers posted Pakistan, Turkey flags; account control regained within 30-45 minutes as Nana Patole demands Home Dept answers

title: Second socio-educational survey set to commence on September 22 across Karnataka, barring Greater Bengaluru Authority area
content: Barring the Greater Bengaluru Authority (GBA) area, the second socio-educational survey being conducted by the Karnataka State Commission for Backward Classes to enumerate a population of seven crore will commence across Karnataka

title: Ayurvedic medicine manufacturers in Kerala exploring legal options to get ‚Äòbhasmam‚Äô from Forest dept.
content: A 2023 amendment to the Wildlife (Protection) Act, 1972, permits incineration of dead animals‚Äô horns and tusks, the ash of which is a major component of Ayurvedic medicines. Though the drug manufacturers are keen on getting the ash released, Forest dept. officials say it may not be legally possible

title: GST 2.0 will increase people‚Äôs purchasing power, says Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu¬†
content: The slashing of GST on many essential goods is a big¬† positive for the middle classes, farmers and artisans, he says

title: Yaduveer questions move to conduct caste census ‚Äòhastily‚Äô
content: ‚ÄòThe caste census scheduled to begin from September 22 coincides with Dasara festivities when people are busy travelling and officials tied up with festival duties‚Äô

title: UK, Canada, Australia recognise Palestinian state; Israel condemns move ‚Äî 10 points
content: Amidst escalating tensions, several world leaders, including those from the UK, Canada, Australia, and France, are moving to recognize a Palestinian state, challenging long-standing diplomatic norms. This decision has sparked strong opposition from Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, who views it as a threat to Israel's survival.

title: New twist! India players shake hands with officials; Pakistan left baffled
content: Tensions flared between India and Pakistan at the Asia Cup as Indian players twice avoided handshakes with their opponents, continuing a controversy that began during the group stage. This gesture was notably absent both before and after their Super Four clash in Dubai. India won the game by six wickets and 7 balls to spare.

title: New GST rates effective today: What is cheaper & dearer?
content: New GST rates 2025 full list effective today: The Modi government's next-generation GST reforms take effect on September 22, 2025, coinciding with the start of Navratri. These reforms reduce tax slabs to 5% and 18%, making household items, cars, and food cheaper. Here is the full list of new item-wise GST rates:

title: Tributes paid to fallen soldier; op on to track down terrorists in J&K forest
content: Lance Dafadar Baldev Chand of the Indian Army was killed in action during a counter-terrorism operation in the Seoj Dhar forest between Doda and Udhampur. Army and J&K police honored his sacrifice with floral tributes. A large-scale search operation is underway, employing drones and sniffer dogs, to locate and neutralize the terrorists.

title: H-1B visa hike: Zoho founder to Indians in US; ‚ÄòDo not live in fear‚Äô
content: Following the significant H-1B visa fee increase announced by the US, Zoho founder Sridhar Vembu is encouraging Indian tech professionals in America to return to India. Drawing parallels with the Partition, Vembu assures them that rebuilding their lives in India will ultimately lead to success, given the country's burgeoning opportunities and thriving tech ecosystem.

title: Search op launched after suspected Pak-drone sighted near border in Jammu
content: Border Security Force (BSF) initiated a search operation in the RS Pura sector of Jammu following the detection of a suspected Pakistani drone along the International Border. This marks the fourth drone sighting this month, prompting concerns about potential airdropping of weapons or narcotics.

title: PM Modi's address: NDA hails 'GST Bachat Utsav'; oppn calls it a 'band-aid' fix
content: Following PM Modi's announcement of next-generation GST reforms, opposition leaders criticized the changes as inadequate and overdue, while BJP leaders praised the Prime Minister's initiative. Congress leaders demanded an apology for past GST implementations, while AAP focused on international trade issues.

title: Charlie Kirk funeral: Thousands gather at Arizona stadium to honor slain activist
content: A massive memorial service was held for Charlie Kirk at State Farm Stadium in Arizona, following his tragic death. The event, attended by thousands, featured tributes from prominent political figures like Donald Trump and JD Vance. Enhanced security measures were implemented, and the service included musical performances and heartfelt speeches honoring Kirk's life and legacy.

title: Haunted memory: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella at townhall; ‚Äòone DEC still stays with me‚Äô
content: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella expressed concerns about the company's future in the age of AI, citing the downfall of Digital Equipment Corporation (DEC) as a cautionary example. Nadella acknowledged a perceived lack of empathy within Microsoft's culture and pledged to rebuild trust with employees, following recent job cuts.

title: Asia Cup: Abhishek, Rauf in heated face-off - Watch
content: During the India-Pakistan Asia Cup Super Four clash in Dubai, tensions flared when Abhishek Sharma and Haris Rauf engaged in a heated exchange, prompting umpire intervention. This followed earlier verbal volleys between Indian openers and Pakistani bowlers, highlighting India's fearless approach in chasing Pakistan's total. The charged atmosphere and aggressive play underscored the intense rivalry, captivating the Dubai crowd.

title: Drama! Abhishek, Gill slap Shaheen Afridi with fiery exchanges - Watch
content: The India-Pakistan Asia Cup Super Four match ignited with drama as Indian openers Abhishek Sharma and Shubman Gill aggressively targeted Shaheen Afridi. Abhishek started with a six and some words, while Gill later punctuated a boundary with a pointed gesture. Their aggressive approach set the tone for India's chase of Pakistan's 171/5, signaling a tough night for Pakistan's key bowler.

title: H-1B visa hike: JPMorgan asks staff to return to US before Sept 21
content: JPMorgan and Microsoft are urging H-1B visa holders to return to the U.S. immediately due to President Trump's new directive imposing a $100,000 annual fee on companies for each H-1B worker. This move, effective September 21st, is anticipated to disproportionately impact Indian IT firms like Infosys and TCS, who heavily rely on H-1B visas to deploy professionals in the U.S.

title: Syria to hold first parliamentary election- What you need to know
content: Syria is set to conduct its initial parliamentary election under the new administration on October 5, as announced by the state news agency SANA. Prior to the election, the deadline for submitting appeals against members of the electoral bodies was extended until September 21.

title: PM Modi: Income tax & GST cuts to save Rs 2.5L cr; take pride in buying ‚Äòswadeshi‚Äô
content: Prime Minister Modi spoke of upcoming GST reforms, effective September 22, 2025, calling it 'GST Bachat Utsav'. The revised tax structure features only 5% and 18% slabs, reducing prices on everyday items. Income up to ‚Çπ12 lakh is now tax-exempt, creating a 'double bonanza' for the middle class.

title: Jaden Agassi shares unseen photos with Catherine Holt, celebrates love
content: Jaden Agassi and Catherine Holt celebrated their three-year anniversary on September 20, 2025, sharing heartfelt messages and photos on Instagram. The couple, who adopted a French bulldog named Rocky in June, also attended the US Open women‚Äôs singles final.

title: Why Molly Qerim left First Take: ESPN cites contract, business factors
content: Molly Qerim's exit from ESPN's First Take wasn't due to controversy, but rather a planned transition as her contract neared expiration. ESPN aimed to broaden Qerim's role beyond the show, while financial considerations, particularly Stephen A. Smith's substantial contract, influenced the decision to seek a more cost-effective co-host. The network is now initiating a casting process to find Qerim's replacement.

title: Emma Raducanu net worth 2025: Check her prize money, endorsements, career
content: British tennis sensation Emma Raducanu, aged 22 in 2025, boasts a $15 million net worth, fueled by prize money and lucrative sponsorships from brands like Nike and Dior. Despite a fluctuating career since her historic 2021 US Open win, where she reached world no. 10, Raducanu continues to compete, reaching the third round of the 2025 Australian Open.

title: IND vs PAK: Rare! Only four Indians have done what Abhishek Sharma did to Afridi
content: Abhishek Sharma ignited India's Asia Cup 2025 Super Four chase against Pakistan with a six off Shaheen Afridi's first ball, marking an aggressive start at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium. This sensational hit set the stage for a heated exchange and added intensity to the high-pressure match. India need 172 in 20 overs to win.

title: Asia Cup: India poor with ball; register unwanted record against Pakistan
content: Pakistan started explosively against India in their Asia Cup Super Four clash, reaching 55/1 in the Powerplay, surpassing their previous best. Fakhar Zaman's early dismissal didn't halt their momentum, as Sahibzada Farhan and Saim Ayub kept the tempo high. India's fielding errors and Jasprit Bumrah's expensive spell further contributed to Pakistan's dominance in the opening phase.

title: Happy Navratri: 30+ wishes, quotes & images; share festive greetings
content: Shardiya Navratri 2025, commencing on September 22nd, marks a nine-day celebration of Goddess Durga's triumph over evil. The festival is a blend of spiritual devotion, cultural festivities with Garba dances, and communal harmony. People share messages, wishes, and quotes to spread joy and blessings, embodying the essence of devotion and renewal.

title: Travis Hunter‚Äôs Father: Hidden confession to college choice; untold story behind Sanders move
content: Travis Hunter Jr., the top high school player in 2021, surprised everyone by choosing Jackson State against his father's wishes for Florida State or Georgia. Driven by his admiration for Deion Sanders, Hunter Jr. excelled at Jackson State before following Sanders to Colorado. He became a two-way star, mirroring Coach Prime's legacy, showcasing his talent on both offense and defense.

title: IND vs PAK: Farhan‚Äôs AK-47 celebration against India stuns fans; pic goes viral
content: During the high-stakes India-Pakistan Asia Cup Super Four match, Pakistani opener Sahibzada Farhan ignited a viral moment by celebrating his half-century with a controversial AK-47 mimicking gesture. This bold display followed a powerful six off Axar Patel, sparking immediate reactions and dividing opinions online amidst the charged atmosphere of the high-profile cricket clash.

title: Zubeen Garg to be cremated near Guwahati with full state honours; funeral set for September 23
content: Popular singer Zubeen Garg will be cremated with full state honors on September 23 near Guwahati, Assam, as announced by Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma. This decision, reached during a cabinet meeting, respects the family's wishes. While Jorhat residents desired the cremation there, the family's preference was prioritized. The state mourning period has been extended to accommodate the cremation.

title: IND vs PAK: Unbelievable! Pandya extends record with Fakhar wicket
content: Hardik Pandya continued his impactful performances in India-Pakistan clashes by dismissing Fakhar Zaman in the Asia Cup Super Four match. Despite Zaman's aggressive start, Pandya's strategic bowling change led to a crucial breakthrough, unsettling Pakistan's momentum. This wicket extended Pandya's impressive record against Pakistan in T20Is, solidifying his role as a key bowler for India in high-pressure matches.

title: Controversial? ‚ÄòUngliya nahi dikh rahi aapko‚Äô: Zaman dismissal sparks debate
content: During the India-Pakistan Asia Cup Super Four match, Fakhar Zaman's controversial dismissal ignited debate. Hardik Pandya's delivery led to a catch claimed by Sanju Samson, but replays were inconclusive, causing Fakhar to hesitate. Ultimately, the third umpire ruled him out, sparking reactions and adding intensity to the high-stakes encounter, providing India with a crucial breakthrough.

title: IND vs PAK: 'How is the mood?' - Shastri asks Pakistan captain at toss
content: The India-Pakistan rivalry continues with off-field drama at the Asia Cup Super Four clash. Despite the lingering handshake row, Pakistan's captain downplayed the tension, focusing on the game. India opted to bowl first, bringing in Bumrah and Chakaravarthy. Notably, the handshake between the skippers was absent for the second time, highlighting the unease between the teams.

title: 'Not an MLA, but get Rs 20 cr in funds': Sena leader Sarvankar boasts; later clarifies
content: Sada Sarvankar, ex-Shiv Sena MLA, sparked controversy by asserting he secures more funds for his constituency than the current MLA. He stated he brings in ‚Çπ20 crore, contrasting it with Mahesh Sawant's complaints of insufficient resources. Sarvankar, a key figure in the 2022 rebellion siding with Eknath Shinde, clarified he was referring to funds managed for the Dadar-Mahim area.

title: NFL Streaming: Watch matches live on mobile, PC, and TV; full guide explained
content: To watch NFL games live, explore options like YouTube TV for a comprehensive view, ESPN for Monday Night Football, and NBC Sports Peacock for Sunday Night Football. Amazon Prime Video streams Thursday Night Football, while FOX and Paramount+ cover Sunday daytime games. NFL+ offers mobile viewing, and NFL Sunday Ticket is available through YouTube and Everpass.

title: IND vs PAK: Handshake drama continues! SKY humiliates Salman again
content: The India-Pakistan Asia Cup clash is again under scrutiny after Suryakumar Yadav seemingly snubbed Salman Agha at the toss, reigniting handshake controversy from their previous encounter. Avoiding direct comment on the issue during a press conference, Suryakumar emphasized the team's focus on their performance and preparation, despite facing criticism from fans advocating a boycott following the Pahalgam attack.

title: GST reforms will accelerate India's growth story, says PM Modi - top quotes
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi addressed the nation on Sunday, celebrating the upcoming implementation of new GST reforms on September 22. He hailed the initiative as "GST Bachat Utsav," emphasizing its significance in advancing Aatmanirbhar Bharat. Modi highlighted the timing of the reforms with the start of Navratri, framing it as a crucial step towards self-reliant India.

title: Child‚Äôs remains found near D4vd‚Äôs home?: Rumors swirl; police investigate Celeste Rivas link
content: The internet is ablaze following the discovery of Celeste Rivas's dismembered body in D4vd's car trunk, intensifying scrutiny of the singer. Unverified claims of infant remains found near his residence and resurfaced Discord chats hinting at Rivas's pregnancy have further fueled speculation. The investigation continues as authorities sweep D4vd's apartment, while social media remains divided over the shocking allegations.

title: Asia Cup: India unleash their strongest missile vs Pakistan - Who is back in XI?
content: India and Pakistan are poised for a high-stakes Asia Cup Super Four showdown in Dubai. Jasprit Bumrah's return bolsters India's lineup, while Pakistan grapples with batting consistency. Off-field drama adds to the tension, with Pakistan's cancelled press conference highlighting the uncertainty. While India appear stronger on paper, Pakistan's unpredictability makes them a formidable opponent.

title: Encounter breaks out between Army & terrorists in J&K; operation under way
content: On Sunday, the Army engaged in a firefight with terrorists in a forest area of Kishtwar district, Jammu and Kashmir, during an intelligence-based operation. The exchange of fire occurred around 1 pm, but there were no immediate reports of casualties. This incident follows a recent encounter near the Doda-Udhampur border on Friday, where one soldier was injured.

title: Youth ODIs: Not 14-yo Suryavanshi! Two India U19 batters shine in win vs Oz
content: India U19 triumphed over Australia U19 by seven wickets in the first Youth ODI, powered by impressive unbeaten half-centuries from Abhigyan Kundu (87) and Vedant Trivedi (61). Their 152-run partnership guided India to chase down the target of 226 with ease, despite early wickets. Henil Patel's 3-38 restricted Australia to 225/9, with John James's unbeaten 77 providing some resistance.

title: Caitlin Clark Fined: From playoff win to referee mock claims; WNBA penalty sparks debate
content: WNBA star Caitlin Clark, currently sidelined with a groin injury, claims the league fined her $200 for criticizing referees on Instagram after the Fever's playoff win against the Atlanta Dream. Clark's sarcastic comment about the referees followed a post celebrating the team's "elite bench mob." Teammate Sophie Cunningham jokingly suggested a GoFundMe to help Clark pay the fine.

title: $100k H-1B fees higher than salaries of many professionals: L-1 visas an alternative?
content: The Trump administration's $100,000 H-1B visa fee hike is poised to significantly impact the Indian IT sector. Companies may explore L-1 visas, but these face limitations and increased scrutiny. Experts warn of workforce departures, offshore job movement, and a potential boost for countries like India.

title: Asia Cup: Shocking! PSL franchise omits India again from matchday poster again
content: The India versus Pakistan Asia Cup match faces controversy. Karachi Kings' poster excludes India, sparking outrage. Earlier, India won against Pakistan, but handshakes were declined. A plea to cancel the match reached the Supreme Court due to terrorism concerns. Despite issues, anticipation for the cricket match remains high. Fans await the high-voltage clash.

title: Akshay Kumar jokes about Kapil's Canada Cafe firing; says 'Itni aamdani Hai ke wahan goliyan chali'
content: Akshay Kumar graced the finale of 'The Great Indian Kapil Show,' engaging in humorous banter with Kapil Sharma. Kapil playfully questioned Akshay's prolific career, leading Akshay to retort with a joke about Kapil's multiple ventures and recent issues at his Canadian caf√©. Akshay also honored stuntmen and shared life revelations during the episode.

title: "Rewarding Terror With Enormous Prize": Netanyahu To UK, Canada On Palestine
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Sunday issued a warning to Britain, Canada, and Australia after the three countries formally recognised Palestinian state and accused them of "rewarding terror" in the wake of the October 7 Hamas attack.

title: US President Donald Trump Leads Tribute To Activist Charlie Kirk At Arizona Service
content: President Donald Trump and prominent members of his "Make America Great Again" movement were paying tribute Sunday to conservative activist Charlie Kirk, whose slaying has marked a signal moment in America's fraught political atmosphere.

title: NDTV Explains: What Gets Cheaper Under GST 2.0 Reforms
content: India will witness a restructuring of its Goods and Services Tax (GST) system from tomorrow that government officials have described as the launch of "GST 2.0."

title: Rat On Board: IndiGo Flight Delayed By 3 Hours At Kanpur Airport
content: An IndiGo Airlines flight was delayed for about three hours at Kanpur Airport today after a rat was spotted inside the aircraft, causing inconvenience to 140 passengers and airport staff.

title: Man Strangles Live-In Partner, Stuffs Body In Bag. Then Takes Selfie With It
content: A love that blossomed on Instagram ended in betrayal and a grisly murder. A man from Uttar Pradesh's Kanpur killed her live-in partner after he suspected her of having an affair with another man.

title: Woman's Live-In Partner Arrested For Killing Her Daughter In Haryana: Cops
content: The live-in partner of a woman has been arrested for allegedly killing her five-year-old daughter in a fit of rage in Haryana's Rewari district, police said on Sunday.

title: Can Israel-Palestine Conflict Be Resolved Through Two-State Solution Now?
content: France and Saudi Arabia hope to use this year's gathering of world leaders at United Nations General Assembly and the increasingly horrific war in the Gaza Strip to inject new urgency into quest for two-state solution to Israeli-Palestinian conflict

title: Zubeen Garg Died Due To Drowning: Death Certificate
content: Assam Chief Minister, Himanta Biswa Sarma, assured of further investigation into the singer Zubeen Garg's demise after receiving the death certificate of the singer, which mentioned the cause of death as "drowning".

title: Zubeen Garg To Be Cremated On September 23 With Full State Honours
content: Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma on Sunday said that musical maestro Zubeen Garg will be cremated on September 23 with full state honours.

title: After PM Modi's GST Utsav Call, M Kharge's "Band-Aid On Deep Wounds" Jab
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today termed the lowering of Goods and Services Tax (GST) rates as the beginning of "GST Utsav", presenting the reforms as a "double bonanza" to households already benefitting from recent income tax exemptions.

title: Boy, 4, Bludgeoned With Stone By Teen Neighbour In Delhi: Cops
content: The boy had gone missing on Friday, when after returning home from tuition, he went out to play in the Baljeet Nagar area near his house, police said.

title: Video: Madhya Pradesh Woman Practicing Garba Kidnapped By Family Over Marital Dispute
content: A shocking video from Madhya Pradesh's Mandsaur has gone viral on social media, showing a young woman being forcibly dragged away by a group of men and women while she was practicing Garba.

title: In PM Modi's Speech, A Reference To 2014 Article On India's Trade Practices
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today said that the Goods and Services Tax reforms would usher in a countrywide "GST Bachat Utsav," benefiting poor, middle-class, farmers, traders, and entrepreneurs alike.

title: GST 2.0: Individual Health Insurance Premiums To Be GST-Free From Tomorrow
content: Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman announced a major reform under GST 2.0 at the 56th GST Council meeting on September 3. Effective September 22, individual health insurance premiums will be completely exempt from GST.

title: Infant Girl Found Dead Inside Abandoned Room In UP, Probe Underway: Cops
content: The dead body of a 10-month-old girl was found inside an deserted room near National Highway-19 in Uttar Pradesh's Bhadohi, police said on Sunday.

title: "Decorate Every Shop With Swadeshi": PM Modi On Eve Of GST Implementation
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi asserted on Sunday that the GST reforms kicking in from Monday will accelerate India's growth story, emphasising that it is a big and important step for "aatmanirbhar Bharat."

title: 'Company Got 5,189 H-1B Visas, Then Laid Off 16,000 Americans': US Defends Move
content: The White House issued a fact sheet, justifying US President Donald Trump's move to impose a fee of USD 100,000 on H-1B visa applications, citing concern over US workers being replaced with "lower-paid foreign labour"

title: In A Historic Move, UK, Canada And Australia Formally Recognise Palestinian State
content: Britain, Canada and Australia formally recognised a Palestinian state on Sunday, joining other nations in a move aimed at reviving momentum for a two-state solution but which has been criticised by Israel and the United States.

title: Netanyahu Confirms Progress In Syria Talks, But Says Security Deal Still Far off
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Sunday there has been progress on a security deal with Syria but an agreement was not imminent.

title: 60K club: Aaron Rodgers jumps to sixth all time, Matthew Stafford eyes ninth
content: Aaron Rodgers became the ninth quarterback to throw for 60,000 regular-season passing yards . he threw for 245 yards in the win against the Houston Texans . the Rams chose to rest him ahead of their playoff run .

title: Latest projections for all 46 postseason CFB games
content: the five highest-ranked conference champions will make the field . the other eight teams will meet in first-round games at the campus sites of seeds Nos. 5 through 8 . this season's national championship game will be played in the new year's six bowls .

title: Wrestlepalooza grades: Did Rhodes-McIntyre, Cena-Lesnar get above-average marks?

title: Power Rankings: Where every team ranks with less than two weeks left
content: three teams have clinched playoff spots for the second consecutive year . there are nine left to fill with 11 days remaining in the 2025 regular season . it's just a matter of time before additional clubs lock up berths, but others still have a lot to play for .

title: Updated SP+ rankings for all 136 FBS teams
content: Paul Finebaum explains why he's all-in on Miami as a true championship contender . it's a tempo- and opponent-adjusted measure of college football efficiency . if you're lucky or unimpressive in a win, your rating will probably fall .

title: Buccaneers' '76 throwbacks reign supreme in NFL Week 3 threads
content: the originals include a running Jaguar on the teal jersey sleeves and a triple-color stripe on white pants . the helmet has the original primary logo decal worn from 1995 to 2013, with the numbers complementing the look in white with a black and golf .

title: WNBA playoff schedule: Semifinals set with Mercury-Lynx, Fever-Aces
content: the WNBA semifinals are a best-of-five with a 2-2-1 setup . the higher seed will host games 1, 2, 5 and 7 . we'll update each series as games are played and each round as matchups are decided .

title: Best of NFL Week 3's arrivals, featuring Adam Thielen's retro Randy Moss jersey
content: the pregame tunnel turned into a red carpet runway in week 3 . seasoned vets and rookies showed out in looks that ranged from sharp suits to effortless streetwear . the most stylish arrivals from week 3 were Adam Thielen .

title: Projecting the CFP top 12 after Week 4: There's a new No. 1
content: the canes haven't won an ACC title since joining the league in 2004 . it's still early, but statement wins are hard to come by . the 13-member college football playoff selection committee doesn't release its first ranking until Nov. 4 .

title: AP Week 4 poll reaction: What's next for each Top 25 team
content: the Oklahoma Sooners beat the Auburn Tigers 24-17 in the AP poll . the ranked no. 7 team opened their SEC schedule with a 24-17 win . ranked No. 7 was the no. 11 Indiana Hoosiers crushing the then-No. 9 Illinois Fighting Illini .

title: üèà College Football Playoff picks after Week 4
content: Texas Tech Red Raiders , Indiana Hoosiers , Oklahoma Sooners and Miami Hurricanes got the spotlight . a few of the top teams in the SEC and the Big Ten were off in Week 4 . the Sooners are trying to jump into the playoff picture in their second .
